properties.entry: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME=? , MEM_GENDER=? , MEM_BIRTHDAY=? , MEM_NICKNAME=? , MEM_PHONE=? , MEM_LOCATION=? , MEM_EMAIL=? WHERE MEM_USERID=?

SELECT MEM_NO , LOCAL_NO , MEM_USERID , MEM_USERPWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_BIRTHDAY , MEM_GENDER , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_LOCATION , MEM_ENROLL_DATE , B_LIST_CHECK , LEAVE_CHECK , MANAGER_CHECK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_USERID=? AND LEAVE_CHECK='N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET LEAVE_CHECK='Y' WHERE MEM_USERID=? AND MEM_USERPWD=?
